channel.title: 317 [pi]
channel.description: I have a 317 [PI] RSPS and it loads 562 graphics. I was just wondering if i could change that to where it loads 667 on a 317 source? I dont think i can but I really dont know. If I can, could anyone help me a little bit about how i would do it? I cant really find a tutorial anywhere.. :palm:

item.title: 317 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

beale:

Well you obviously knew what i meant… and I am looking to just change the maps, just so it looks like a 667 world.

667 maps have objects that 317’s don’t have. So you’d also need 667 objects.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/414626-adding-667-maps.html
There’s the maps (I did not check the links). The link I gave you earlier should have the rest.

Good luck figuring out all the proper readvalues.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:550878”]1) Your PI server has nothing to do with your client loading graphics.

  1. Yes, it can, but it will be hard for a beginner to do such a thing.

  2. You didn’t specify what you’re trying to change/load. Maps? Objects? Items? Npcs? Players? Npc chat head? Player chat heads? Animations? Graphics? Interfaces?

  3. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/454769-data-releases-474-498-508-525-602-634-667-a.html[/quote]
    Well you obviously knew what i meant… and I am looking to just change the maps, just so it looks like a 667 world.

Read full topic
